SEARCH

Class Property

java.lang.Object
Property
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullProperty, SharedProperty
public abstract class Property extends Object implements Comparable
The Property class represents a property. It contains information about the property, such as its property ID, number of bedrooms, number of rooms, city, price per day, and the host ID associated with the property.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mert Can Bilgin

  • Constructor Details

    • Property

      public Property(int propertyId, int noBedRooms, int noRooms, String city, double pricePerDay, Date date, String inspectionReview)
      Constructs a Property with the specified details. This constructor initializes a Property object with the provided property ID, number of bedrooms, number of rooms, city, price per day, and inspection details. It sets the values of these properties based on the parameters passed to the constructor.
      Parameters:
      propertyId - The unique identifier of the property.
      noBedRooms - The number of bedrooms in the property.
      noRooms - The total number of rooms in the property.
      city - The city where the property is located.
      pricePerDay - The price per day for renting the property.
      date - The date of the inspection.
      inspectionReview - The review of inspection.

    • Property

      public Property(int propertyId, int noBedRooms, int noRooms, String city, double pricePerDay)
      Construct the property with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      propertyId - The unique identifier of the property.
      noBedRooms - The number of bedrooms.
      noRooms - The number of rooms.
      city - The city.
      pricePerDay - The price per day.

    • Property

      public Property()
      Default constructor.

    • Property

      public Property(int propertyId, int noBedRooms, int noRooms, String city, double pricePerDay, Host belongsTo)
      Constructs a Property with the specified details. This constructor initializes a Property object with the provided property ID, number of bedrooms, number of rooms, city, and price per day. It sets the values of these properties based on the parameters passed to the constructor.
      Parameters:
      propertyId - The unique identifier of the property.
      noBedRooms - The number of bedrooms in the property.
      noRooms - The total number of rooms in the property.
      city - The city where the property is located.
      pricePerDay - The price per day for renting the property.
      belongsTo - The host of the property.
